title: The Horseman (Full Movie) Suspense l Crime

sources.title: The Horseman (Full Movie) Suspense l Crime
sources.description:
When Christian's daughter dies, so does any sense of remorse as he searches for vengeance at all costs. Tracking down the men responsible one by one, he reaches a new level of brutality and discovers how far he has to go to settle the score. A shocking and merciless experience, THE HORSEMAN pushes the limits of gritty revenge tales.


Directed by Steven Kastrissios
2008
Starring Peter Marshall, Brad McMurray, Caroline Marohasy


Edited for YouTube ad standards
